front.title: Internet Printing Protocol (IPP): The 'ippget' Delivery Method for Event Notifications

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the Internet Printing Protocol/1.1: Model and Semantics (RFC 2911, RFC 2910). This document specifies the 'ippget' Pull Delivery Method for use with the 'Internet Printing Protocol (IPP): Event Notifications and Subscriptions' specification (ipp-ntfy). This IPPGET Delivery Method is REQUIRED for all clients and Printers that support ipp-ntfy. The Notification Recipient, acting as a client, fetches (pulls) Event Notifications using the Get-Notifications operation defined in this document.
